## 2
```{r}
func_y <- function(x){
  if(x <= 0){
    y = -1*x ^ 3
  }
  else if(x > 0 & x <= 1){
    y <- x^2
  }
  else if(x > 1){
    y <- x^0.5
  }
  return(y)
}

x_vals <- as.numeric(seq(-2, 2, length.out=1000))
y_vals <- as.numeric(lapply(x_vals, func_y))
df <- data.frame(x_vals, y_vals)
ggplot(data = df, aes(x=x_vals, y=y_vals), xlab="x", ylab="f(x)") + geom_point()
```
